scripts.pack: npm run build && webpack --mode="development" --devtool source-map dist/src/main.js -o dist/bundle.js && sorcery -i dist/bundle.js
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.build: npm --prefix ./../MetaDataTransformer run build && npm run restore && npm --prefix ./../MetaDataTransformer run start -- -v build --pattern="/src/**/*.ts" --out-dir="./dist" --root-dir="./../MetaDataTransformerUsage" --module=CommonJS --module-resolution=NodeJs --target=ES5 --source-map --source-root=".\..\..\..\.." --map-root=".\.."
scripts.clean: (npm --prefix ./../MetaDataTransformer run clean) && (if exist node_modules rmdir node_modules /q /s) && (if exist dist rmdir dist /q /s) && (if exist package-lock.json del -f -q package-lock.json) && (if exist test_out rmdir test_out /q /s)
scripts.test: npm run clean && npm --prefix ./../MetaDataTransformer run build && npm run restore && npm --prefix ./../MetaDataTransformer run start -- -v build --pattern="/test/**/*.ts" --root-dir="./../MetaDataTransformerUsage" --out-dir="./test_out" && jest .test.js
